LanguageData.ResearchSkywrathController.label: Skywrath Controller
LanguageData.ResearchSkywrathController.description: Don't bother researching this, this is just a modder trick to hide a building..。
LanguageData.ResearchSkywrathController.descriptionDi: You can now build a powerful weather controller to unleash the sky's wrath on your ennemies。
